items.sentence: I don't think Tom can help you do that today.
I don't see any reason why Tom can't go, too.
I don't have a car. I usually just use Tom's.
I didn't understand why Tom behaved that way.
I didn't think Tom would be so disrespectful.
I can't believe Tom is really planning to go.
I advised Tom not to leave his door unlocked.
I advised Tom not to buy Mary's old computer.
Tom has lost a lot of weight since last year.
Tom doesn't want Mary to know where he lives.
